title: Fertility rate in Brazil
yAxis: Number of children born per woman
summary: This statistic shows the fertility rate in bangladesh from 2007 to 2017 The fertility rate is the average number of children borne by one woman while being of child-bearing age . In 2017 , the fertility rate in bangladesh amounted to 2.06 children per woman .
gold: This statistic shows the fertility rate in Brazil from 2007 to 2017 . The fertility rate is the average number of children born by one woman while being of child-bearing age . In 2017 , the fertility rate among Brazil 's population amounted to 1.74 children per woman .
